GSD.description:
Reinstate some of "swiotlb: rework "fix info leak with DMA_FROM_DEVICE""

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.2 by commit f2141881b530738777c28bb51c62175895c8178b. For more details please see the references link.
